definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: pulling up, breaking camp, setting out, journey;—abs. ´[[מ]] Nu 10:2, De 10:11; pl. cstr. [[מַסְעֵי]] Nu 10:28, Nu 33:1; sf. [[מַסָּעָיו]] Ge 13:3, [[מַסְעֵיהֶם]] Ex 17:1 + 6 t.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: pulling up, breaking camp (c. acc. [[מַחֲנֶה]]; Ges:§ 45 e, 115 d) Nu 10:2.

station, stage, journey (by stages), ´[[וַיֵּלֶךְ לְמ]] Ge 13:3 and he went by (acc. to) his journeyings (cf. [[הלך]], p. 231 a supr.); [[לְמַסְעֵיהֶם]] Ex 17:1 cf. Ex 40:36; Ex 40:38, Nu 10:12 (all P; all c. [[נׇסַע]]), Nu 33:1, Nu 33:2 (‖[[מוֹחָאֵיהֶם]]), v:Nu 33:2 (‖ id.); [[קוּם]] [[לֵךְ לְמַסַּע]] De 10:11 for journeying (v. Dr).
